bursary.translation[0].definitions[0].de: an amount of money given to someone so that they can study at a university or college
bursary.translation[1].definitions[0].de: in the US, the place at a college or university where the accounts and finance are dealt with
bursary.translation[1].definitions[1].de: in Britain, an amount of money given to some students by a college or university to help them study there. Bursaries are also given by the government or other organizations
